participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and humorous, enjoys social interactions and has a passion for music.
participant_1.background: I like to go to country concerts on weekends. I like to work on vintage cars. I have two dogs. My favorite music is country.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and ambitious, with a deep appreciation for music and a strong work ethic.
participant_2.background: I also work as a custodian to help pay the bills. I play the piano and guitar and sing. My favorite type of music to sing is folk music. I'm a musician and hope to make it big someday.

content.text: As a musician I am sometimes in front of an audience that just doesn't react , I hope I 'm not performing so badly here
I spend long hours walking the deserted hallways of empty museums
I work as a custodian on the side until I've made it big in the music business
got to be quick before that goes out of fashion again
